text: Xenodonta is a genus of sea snails, deep-sea limpets, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Bathysciadiidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Xenodonta include: * Xenodonta bogasoni Warén, 1993 ==Distribution== European waters ==References== ==External links== Category:Bathysciadiidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Xenodonta
